Package camzup.core

Class Curve2

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.EntityData
camzup.core.Curve
camzup.core.Curve2
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEntityData, IUtils, java.lang.Iterable<Curve2.Knot2>
public class Curve2
extends Curve
implements java.lang.Iterable<Curve2.Knot2>
Organizes a Bezier curve into a list of knots. Provides a function to retrieve a point and tangent on a curve from a step in the range [0.0, 1.0].

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  Curve2.Knot2
    Groups together vectors which shape a Bezier curve into a coordinate (or anchor point), fore handle (the following control point) and rear handle (the preceding control point).

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class camzup.core.Curve

    Curve.ArcMode

      stopAngle - the stop angle
      radius - the arc radius
      arcMode - the arc mode

    • random

      public static Curve2 random​(Random rng, int count, float lowerBound, float upperBound, boolean closedLoop, Curve2 target)
      Creates a random curve. Generates random points, creates a curve from those points, then smooths the knots' handles.
      Parameters:
      rng - the random number generator
      count - the number of knots to generate
      lowerBound - the lower bound
      upperBound - the upper bound
      closedLoop - whether the curve is a closed loop
      target - the target curve
      Returns:
      the random curve

    • eval

      public Curve2.Knot2 eval​(float step, Curve2.Knot2 target)

    • eval

      public Vec2 eval​(float step, Vec2 coord, Vec2 tangent)
      Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0], returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      step - the step
      coord - the output coordinate
      tangent - the output tangent
      Returns:
      the coordinate
      See Also:
      Vec2.bezierPoint(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, float, Vec2), Vec2.bezierTanUnit(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, Vec2, float, Vec2)

    • evalFirst

      public Vec2 evalFirst​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 tangent)
      Evaluates the first knot in the curve. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      coord - the output coordinate
      tangent - the output tangent
      Returns:
      the coordinate
      See Also:
      Vec2.subNorm(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2)

    • evalLast

      public Vec2 evalLast​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 tangent)
      Evaluates the last knot in the curve. The tangent will be normalized, to be of unit length.
      Parameters:
      coord - the output coordinate
      tangent - the output tangent
      Returns:
      the coordinate
      See Also:
      Vec2.subNorm(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2)

    • evalRange

      public Vec2[][] evalRange​(int count)
      Evaluates an array of vectors given a supplied length. The array is two-dimensional, where the first element of the minor dimension is the coordinate and the second is the tangent.
      Parameters:
      count - the count
      Returns:
      the array

    • reverse

      public Curve2 reverse​(Vec2 temp)
      Reverses the curve. This is done by reversing the list of knots and swapping the fore- and rear-handle of each knot.
      Parameters:
      temp - a temporary vector
      Returns:
      this curve
      See Also:
